about_the_game:
A horror FPS genre game about a man's survival in the night in an abandoned house in the forest.
Jacob, a young man with a penchant for adventure, finds himself driving alone down a winding road in the heart of an expansive, eerie forest. The air is thick with an ominous chill, and a sense of isolation looms as the towering trees seem to close in, casting long, ghostly shadows across the path. Suddenly, out of the darkness, an animal appears in the middle of the road. With barely any time to react, Jacob’s car swerves off the road and crashes, leaving him stranded and injured in the darkness, the metal crunching against the tree. Shaken but unhurt, he quickly tries to call for help, only to find that his phone has no signal. Trapped, he realizes he must venture out into the unknown to find shelter for the night. With no other choice, Jacob begins to walk deeper into the forest, his footsteps muffled by the damp leaves carpeting the ground. After what feels like hours of wandering, he finally spots a flicker of light through the dense trees. As he pushes forward, the outline of an old mansion emerges, cloaked in shadows and barely visible under the faint moonlight. The house appears abandoned yet unsettlingly intact, standing as a testament to another era. Trapped in the twisted reality of the house, Jacob must confront the spirits, unravel the secrets of the ritual, and survive until dawn. But as he delves deeper, he begins to wonder: did he find the house, or did the house find him?.

name: The Cursed Ritual

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update) or Windows® 11 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: The Cursed Ritual is a horror genre FPS game about a person who gets stuck in the middle of the forest in midnight as his car crashes. With no signal in midnight he wanders through the forest finding a shelter to pass the night and finds an abandoned house. Explore the secrets of the haunted house.
